text: (â€˜Jakattu' markkavariyakiya) tanamellam variyavarkalukkum, elaikalukkum, atai vaculippavarkalukkum, putitaka islamait taluviyavarkalukkum, atimaikalai vitutalai ceyvatarkum, katanil mulkiyavarkalukkum, allahvutaiya pataiyil por ceyvatarkum, valippokkarkalukkum (urittanataka) allah erpatuttiya kattaya katamaiyakum. Allah (anaittaiyum) mika arintavan, nanamutaiyavan avan
